title: Accountant - Luxembourg Gare - Competitive Salary
description:
Accountant - Luxembourg Gare - Competitive Salary



We are looking for an accountant on behalf of one of our clients. The company is an investment firm specialized in real estate. With a presence in multiple countries across Europe and several decades of experience, the Luxembourg-based company maintains particularly close ties with its teams in Germany. Located in the Gare district of Luxembourg City and composed of around ten people, the company offers modern offices and a very pleasant working atmosphere. You will be joining a finance team of six individuals.



Your Responsibilities | Training - Development

As an accountant, you will be expected to:

   
   
 * Handle the day-to-day accounting of various entities
 * Prepare monthly, quarterly, and annual financial statements
 * Assist with audits and liaise with external auditors
 * Ensure compliance with local and international accounting standards
 * Prepare VAT and tax returns
 * Collaborate closely with the finance team and other departments
 * Support the implementation and improvement of internal processes and controls
 * Communicate with external stakeholders such as banks, auditors, and tax authorities
   
   


Profile and Career Path | Training - Development

   
   
 * To succeed in this position, you should have between 2 and 6 years of experience in a similar field in Luxembourg.
 * You must be fluent in both English and German.
 * A work-study (alternance) experience will also be considered an asset.
   
   


Offer | Training - Development

This position offers numerous benefits, including:

   
   
 * A very good work-life balance, with no overtime
 * One day of remote work per week
 * A young and dynamic team
 * Employer-paid training
 * A family-like working environment
 * A gross annual salary of up to €60,000, depending on your profile and skills
 * Meal vouchers
 * A pension plan
 * A bonus
   
   


Abiomis is a boutique recruitment & advisory agency specialized in the Financial and Legal fields in Luxembourg and Belgium, offering entry level to executive management positions all over the country.

At Abiomis, we value what matters most to you. We know listening is key and, in doing so, this allows us to determine together which opportunities could suit you and your criteria best. Whether you are a candidate or company, we are here every step of the way and it will be our pleasure to assist you in your evolution.

Contact us today at +352 26 38 38 50 to discuss your next career move or have a look at our current vacancies on www.abiomis.com .
